评论详情: Love the large numbers the blue clock and brown band the first delivery came with an empty bag for some reason but I called Amazon and it was re delivered . Great buy for my Father
This watch looks just like Grampas but fancier!!! I love if. Very very nice!

This is a nice watch. It does what it should, old school actually looking at my watch to tell time. It seems pretty well made and the band was nice. I do wear it occasionally with black clothes it matches nicely

Nice large black face men’s watch, easy to read date and time . The diamond numerals and silver hands on the black face makes the watch noticeable and dressy. Extremely attractive and the black crocodile leather band is comfortable and adjustable to wrist size. This watch is quality made , keeping accurate time and affordable.
Absolutely love. Looks so good and expensive. So it’s definitely a great value.

I got this watch as a gift for my husband. This watch is aesthically appealing and compliments his outfit very nicely. The watch itself is light and doesn't feel heavy on the arm. The band is smooth, and you can adjust the band to your level of comfortability. This watch will tell the time and date. You can't go wrong because this is great for an everyday watch or even for a nice occasion.

This ended up being a great looking watch in person. The color and design looks very nice and the fit on my wrist was comfortable and nice. It is easy to adjust the time and so far has worked well as a watch. The strap for the watch is pretty good and comfortable on your skin. Overall, this is a nice solid watch for your rotation

评论概述: Liked how it looked, can’t keep time
评论详情: Within the 1st month, this thing could not keep time for more than an hour.

I love watches, mainly for the aesthetic appeal. This watch is one of my favorites, even over some of the more expensive models.  It looks great and the face is just the right size for my wrist. I prefer leather straps and this one actually fits perfectly! It doesn't slide around or move at all, so that's a win. It's waterproof and the hands are glow in the dark.  The price is incredible since it looks like a much fancier watch. It's hard to tell if it's well-made, though. For the low price, it's worth the gamble. I really like this watch!

If you are looking for a reasonable watch that looks nice, check this one out. I purchased this to take on vacation overseas because I get a nice looking watch that I don't have to worry about being stolen or lost. Setting the time, day, date is straight forward and typical for other watches. The watch face is good looking and the blue model I got looks good with the brown strap. For the price I didn't expect high quality but for the price of this watch I think it represents a good value. The watch and strap are good with no issues.

Elegance is often found in the simplest designs and this classic wristwatch is an elegant addition to your jewelry collection. The plain silver (slightly leaning gold) face with clear numbered hash marks presents exactly the information you need and nothing else. The chronograph watch has its place, but for many occasions all that is needed is the ability to show up on time and this beautiful watch performs admirably. A small day and date window provides this if you need it. The watch is matched to a simple leather band that breaks in nicely and becomes comfortable quickly. This is a fine choice.

评论概述: Looks great, keeps good time, but I wonder about the overall quality of mechanism
评论详情: Looks great, keeps good time, but I wonder about the overall quality of the watch mechanism.  I purchased the blue dial / brown band version with numerals.  It looks great.  The blue dial is beautiful and easy to read and the metal case in polished and looks very nice.  The brown leather strap has an alligator pattern and looks nice albeit a bit stiff which I assume will go away after break in.  The only question I have is about the quality of watch mechanism.  While it has kept time well thus far, the watch is far lighter than I expected and when one adjusts the time and other functions the mechanism feels very looks, as it its hard to set an exact time because when the stem is pushed in it moves the hands just a bit.  The mechanism does not feel as though it is very high quality so I wonder how well it will hold up over time.  Overall, it's a very nice watch and for the money a good value.  So as a fashion statement I think it's very good.
